unit_learning_outcomes.description: Gain in-depth knowledge of students and how they learn (AITSL: 1 1, 1 2, 1 3, 1 4, 1 5, 1 6, 4  4, 5  1, 5  2).
Understand the professional role of the teacher (AITSL: 6  1, 6  2, 6  3, 6  4, 7 1, 7 2, 7 4).
Demonstrate thorough knowledge of the relevant teaching subject(s) (AITSL: 2 1, 2 2, 2 3, 2 4, 2 5, 2 6).
Identify and gather evidence of practice aligned to AITSL graduate teacher standards (6  1, 6  2).
Understand the processes of learning, teaching and assessing (AITSL: 3 1, 3 2, 3 3, 3 4, 3 5, 3 6, 3 7, 4  1, 4  2).

enrolment_rules.description: 10cp from EDTE4220-EDTE4340 or TEP434 or 10cp from TEP422-TEP432

assessments.description: A mandated assessment of students' abilities in planning, teaching, assessing and reflecting on practice. Students compile a portfolio during the profession experience placement.
A survey of students' experiences in their studies

assessments.assessment_title: Supervising Teacher Report and Register of Visits
assessments.description: The final professional experience report form completed by the supervising teacher and the register which shows the dates attended at the school and activities undertaken by the TES.

data.unit_offering_text:
Session 1, Weekday attendance, North Ryde
Session 2, Weekday attendance, North Ryde
Session 2, Special circumstances, On location at placement
Session 1, Special circumstances
data.subject_search_title: EDTE4020 - Professional Experience in the Secondary School II
data.description: Students are required to work in a school for at least 20 days under the guidance of a supervising teacher implementing strategies and techniques studied in the 400-level secondary methodology units.
